name: chrome-dashboard
author: Tyler Fowler <tylerfowler.1337@gmail.com>
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src *; font-src https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com; script-src 'self'; worker-src 'self'
